document.docTitle: Cornips dryocausta Razowski & Aarvik & Prins 2010, comb. n.

heading.emphasis:
Cornips dryocausta ( Meyrick, 1938 )
, comb. n. ( Figs 10 , 58 )

subSubSection.paragraph:
Tortrix dryocausta Meyrick, 1938
. Institut des Parcs nationaux du Congo belge 14: 6.

Niphotixa
dryocausta : Brown 2005
. World Catalogue of Insects 5: 434.

materialsCitation.collectorName: G. F. de Witte & L. Aarvik

Remarks. Described from 25 specimens of which 13 are present in the collection. The lectotype was selected by Aarvik in 1998 but was not published until the present paper. Dissection showed that one of the syntypes belongs to an undescribed species—described below as
Cornips gravidspinatus
sp. n. ; it is probable that further syntypes are not conspecific with the lectotype .
